ban.title: User was banned
ban.description: User %usertag% was banned from this server.

error.title: Could not ban user
error.description: I am sorry but I am missing the `BAN_MEMBERS` permission, or the user has administrator permissions.

unban.title: User was unbanned
unban.description: User %usertag% was unbanned on this server.

error.title: Could not unban user
error.description: I am sorry but I am missing the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission, or the user isn't banned.

kick.title: User was kicked
kick.description: User %usertag% was kicked from this server.

error.title: Could not kick user
error.description: I am sorry but I am missing the `KICK_MEMBERS` permission, or the user has administrator permissions.

error.title: Could not mute user
error.description: I am sorry but I am missing the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission, or the user is already muted.

error.title: Could not unmute user
error.description: I am sorry but I am missing the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission, or the user is not muted.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.reset: Reset the command prefix to the default (currently %current%).

error.title: Prefix error
error.only_admin: Only administrators may change the command prefix.
error.only_owner: Only the bot owner(s) may change the global command prefix.

bot.title: AUN Info
bot.description: This is information about the bot AUN.

fields.name: Basic info
fields.value:
Created by: **vyPal#6620**
Created on: **Feb. 9. 2021**
Programming language: **JavaScript**
Library: **discord.js**
Tools: **Repl.it**, **VisualStudio Code**, **GitHub**

fields.name: Bot stats
fields.value:
AUN currently is on **%servers%** server,
and is serving **%users%** users at once.
AUN is currently running on **%shards%** shards.
This is shard number **%shardid%**
It has been online for **%ms%**

fields.name: Advanced info
fields.value:
This is AUN version **%version%**
Hosted on a **%host%** server
All languages used: **JavaScript**, **EJS**, **SQL**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **JSON**, **SQLite**, **DotEnv**

fields.name: AUN Links
fields.value:
